programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep230
programme.desc: Cuckoo Clock - Daddy Pig winds up the old cuckoo clock. When a wooden cuckoo pops out singing Cuckoo!, Peppa thinks it is very funny, but George has missed the whole thing. George does not want to miss the cuckoo again but the cuckoo only pops out once an hour.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep231
programme.desc: The Cycle Ride - Peppa and her family are going for a days cycle ride. Peppa loves cycling downhill but shes not so keen on peddling uphill. So, when the family meet all of Peppas friends and decide to have a race, Peppa insists it should be a down hill race.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep232
programme.desc: Ice Skating - Peppa and George are going ice-skating for the first time. Mummy Pig teaches Peppa to skate and soon she is having lots of fun. Peppa begins to teach George how to skate but it turns out he is a natural born skater. Peppa and George love ice-skating.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Prank Day - Today is Prank day, Anna and her friends must compete to elect the best prankster of all. Everyone's doing a great except Christopher. The friends are surprised when the worst prankster turns out to be the best!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep124
programme.desc: A Present for Ron - Christopher loves Ron's rock collection so much, he wants to add another beautiful rock to it! They set off on a journey to find the most amazing rock they can find. When they discover it - they must figure out a creative solution to get it to Ron!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Blue's Treasure Hunt - Cap'n McStripes (that's ''pirate'' for Josh) and Blue are playing pirates, but where is the treasure?! We play Blue's Clues to figure it out.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep801
programme.desc: Pups Save a Runaway Rooster / Pups Save a Snowbound Cow - Chickaletta and Roosterio run away from a chicken show and get stuck on top of a runaway drone. // When Bettina wanders up Jake's mountain and gets caught in a snowstorm, it's up to the Paw Patrol to bring her safely down.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep821
programme.desc: Dancing with Luke Stars! - A dance contest being judged by Luke Stars goes wrong when a floating dancefloor carries the contestants away.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep703
programme.desc: The Super Skateboard - It's Grammy's birthday but Crusher doesn't have enough money for a special gift! So, Blaze and AJ help him do different jobs and earn the money for Grammy's present. But, they have to hurry so they can be back in time for Grammy's birthday party!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S05 Ep514
programme.desc: Blazing Amazing Stories - Blaze and AJ are babysitting for Baby Gherkin! When it's time for her nap, they tell her three epic bedtime stories about police, cowboys, and superheroes - all starring Blaze and his friends!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Deep Sea Grand Prix - For the first time ever, Blaze and AJ are racing under the ocean! Blaze transforms into a submarine and speeds through sunken ships and coral reefs to reach the giant sand castle at the finish line!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Pups Save a City Kitty - Cali gets lost in the woods.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Air Pups - When Volcano Island erupts, the pups must take to the sky in their new Air Patroller! Using their new flight suits, can they soar to the rescue of Cap'n Turbot, Francois and a monkey family?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Pups Save a Friend / Pups Save a Stowaway - When Marshall decides to take a break from the PAW Patrol, the pups jump into action to bring him back! // When the pups find a stowaway on their trip to the Icy Tundra, they must rescue a run-away kitty on a run-away Snow Cat!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Missing Falcon / Happy Bestie-versary / The Tumminator - Bossy and Turtle go full gumshoe to find Bissy's missing plushy. // Bossy and Turtle decide to exchange gifts for their first annual friendship anniversary. // Bossy and Turtle have to face the scariest ride ever at Wacky Wacky World: The Tumminator!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Snowball Bonanza / The Present - Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza against Carnivore Cove's neighboring town. // Baby Shark goes undercover to figure out the perfect gift for Mommy Shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep204
programme.desc: The Treat Goblin / Baby Super Shark - Goldie blames her missing treats on a monster. // Vigo's plan to turn everyfishy into babies backfires.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Kiko's Song / Return to Merlandia - When the coqus of Isla Encanto stop singing, Santi and crew travel into the rainforest to find out the mystery behind their silence.// The crew return to Merlandia for an underwater fair, but must save the day when the power grid becomes overloaded.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Princess and the Pirate Puppy - Santi and crew will have to team up with a pirate puppy to stop Bonnie Bones and save an old friend.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep233
programme.desc: Dentist - Peppa and George are at the dentist. Dr Elephant says that Peppa and Georges teeth are lovely and clean. But Georges plastic toy Mr Dinosaur teeth are a bit yellow. Dr Elephant polishes Mr Dinosaurs teeth until they are bright and shiny.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep149
programme.desc: Shopping - Peppa and her family go to the grocery store for some tomatoes, spaghetti, onions and fruit, but Daddy Pig gets some chocolate cake for the kids.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep234
programme.desc: Dens - Peppa is playing in the tree-house with the girls, and George and the boys stay in the castle that Grandpa Pig built for them. But when it starts to rain and the garden is covered in muddy puddles, they rush out to play together!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep235
programme.desc: Grandpa's Little Train - Grandpa Pig has built a fantastic little train called Gertrude and he takes Peppa and George for a ride. Along the way they meet their friends and they all hop aboard. Peppa and George think that Gertrude is the very best train in the whole world

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep236
programme.desc: School Bus Trip - Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her school friends on a school bus trip to the mountains. From the top of the mountains there is a fantastic view and Peppa and her friends have fun hearing echoes. After a great day out, the bus takes the children home

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep415
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard - Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Hiccupism / Silence please - Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep408
programme.desc: T-Rex Trouble - Blaze and Zeg are in Dinosaur Valley, showing off their amazing robot powers to their dinosaur friends. But when they discover three lost little Tyrannosauruses, they must use their robot powers to get the babies home safely.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Robots to the Rescue - When three big emergencies turn out to be too much for one truck alone, Blaze turns himself and his friends into super strong robots to save Axle City from a runaway train, an overflowing glue factory, and an erupting volcano!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest - With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll. // When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep617
programme.desc: Pups Save the Bears / Pups Save a Farmerless Farm - Bears are asleep all over town! The PAW Patrol must work quietly to save the bears and return them to their cave. // With the farmers out of town, Mayor Goodway calls the PAW Patrol to wrangle the animals and control the chaos on the farmerless farm

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Coach Grandma / Busy Baby - Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods. // Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Extreme Dodge Bubble - Vola puts it all on the line to win an epic game of Extreme Dodge Bubble.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Paddington Builds Scarecrow / Paddington Plays Hide and Seek - Paddington accidentally ruins Mr. Browns lovely lawn and must repair it. But the birds take a liking to the seeds so he builds a Scarecrow. // Mrs. Bird is a champion hide and seeker but where is she? Paddington, Jonathan and Judy mus go find her.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Paddington and The House Guest / Paddington and The Banana - Mr. Curry is invited by Paddington to stay with the Browns whilst his flooded house is being repaired. He thinks the Browns are too disorganized. // Paddington accidentally takes a banana from the caf without paying for it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep237
programme.desc: Rebecca Rabbit - Peppa and George are going to Rebecca Rabbits house today. It is a bit different to Peppas house; it is inside a hill, with tunnels instead of stairs. They enjoy playing rabbits and everyone is surprised when George discovers he likes carrots!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep238
programme.desc: The baby Piggy - Peppa and George are visiting their big cousin Chlo and her new baby brother, Alexander. Baby Alexander is too little to play games, but Peppa and Chlo have a great idea;

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep239
programme.desc: Nature Trail - Peppa and her family are driving out to the countryside to go for a walk in the woods. Peppa and George discover trails of footprints left by little birds and ants.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep240
programme.desc: Pretend Friend - Suzy Sheep has made up a pretend friend called Leo Lion. Peppa cannot see Leo but Suzy says that Leo likes roaring and dressing up. Peppa decides that now she can see Leo. Even Mummy and Daddy Pig play along. But George feels a bit left out.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Pups Save Apollo / Pups Save the Hippos - Apollo the Super Pup comes to Adventure Bay, in Rubbles dream. The pups must rescue their super hero! // Raimundos dancing hippos shake, rattle, and roll the big top down. The Paw Patrol rebuild just in time for the big show!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep908

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep606
programme.desc: Pups and the Stinky Bubble Trouble / Pups Save the Baby Ostriches - What's that smell? The pups need to work together to lift her to safety, while keeping her soon-to-hatch eggs warm.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Recycling Power! - When Axle City is visited by a littering raccoon, it's up to Blaze to save the day as a Super Recycling Truck! He cleans up the town and rescues his friends - just in time for a final showdown with the Litter Critter!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S03 Ep312
programme.desc: The Big Ant-venture - Blaze and Zeg are on Animal Island when they discover a world of tiny creatures right under their tires: Insect City! The friends transform into a super-strong ant and a bouncy grasshopper for their littlest big adventure yet!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Turtle Tour / Honey Bear / The Science Pair - Turtle gives Gran-Gran a tour of his favorite amusement park. // When Bossy's cousin Honey Bear comes to visit, he struggles to be a a good friend. // Bossy and Turtle try to make the coolest science fair project so they can become hall monitors.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep810

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Chatterbox - Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep242

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep243

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep133

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep103

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep7

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep48

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep23

programme.desc: Survivoring - Cecil takes his kids camping, but Squidina wants the drama of reality TV.

programme.desc: The Fishbowl / Married to Money - Sandy tries to study SpongeBob and Patricks behavior, but her science experiment goes horribly awry. // Mr. Krabs takes Planktons advice, and finally marries the only thing he ever lovedmoney!

programme.desc: Mall Girl Pearl / Two Thumbs Down - Pearl gets a job to be cool like her friends, but the only store thats hiring is the lamest store at the mall! // SpongeBob loses the use of his thumbs, and must get them back in working order before his entire life falls apart.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep198

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep228
programme.desc: Fun-Sized Friends / Grandmum's the Word - SpongeBob and Patrick exchange tiny living versions of themselves. It's a whole hunk of homunculus fun! // Plankton tells his Grandma that he owns the Krusty Krab, but must keep the lie going when she comes to visit.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep229
programme.desc: Doodle Dimension / Moving Bubble Bass - SpongeBob and Patrick become trapped in an alternate dimension where anything they draw comes to life. // SpongeBob and Patrick help Bubble Bass move out of his mother's basement.

programme.desc: High Sea Diving / Bottle Burglars - SpongeBob wants to be the first sponge to dive all the way up to the surface of the ocean! // When SpongeBob and Squidward accidentally let Plankton steal the secret formula, it's up to them to steal it back!

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep109
programme.desc: To Dad and Back / Survivoring - Patrick ventures inside Cecil to learn how the body works. // Cecil takes his kids camping, but Squidina wants the drama of reality TV.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Patrick Show MidSeason Finale - The Patrick Show presents the epic conclusion to the first half of its first season.

programme.desc: Enter the Dragon Part 2 - Po and the Furious Five meet their greatest challenge yet: a supernatural creature who is invincible to the powers of kung fu.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep222
programme.desc: Mama Told Me Not to Kung Fu - Crane's mom visits the Valley of Peace. Crane reveals to Po that his mom hates Kung Fu so he promised her that he would never have anything to do with it. Crane asks Po and the others to help him keep his secret from his mom.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep313
programme.desc: The Firebending Masters - Aang is ready to start his firebending training. However, as Zuko attempts to teach him, he realizes he has lost all his firebending power.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Best Foes - Kowalski invents an enemy detector but it doesn't work. Old enemies are now friends & old friends are now enemies.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Operation: Swap-anzee / Snowmageddon - The Space Agency sends Private to the moon. His ticket is downgraded to one-way and the other birds can't monkey around if they hope to get him home again. // Snowmageddon hits and traps Skipper and Marlene in the convenience store with X.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Tunnel of Love / Skipper Makes Perfect - When a sneeze from Rico causes the underground tunnel system beneath the zoo to rupture Skipper calls in 4 beavers to fix the situation. // Skipper's having one of those perfect days, and he decides to use the opportunity to settle an old score.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Lil Loafie / Oonski the Grateful - When T-Midi rejects a loaf of bread, SwaySway and Buhdeuce take the loaf under their wing and it becomes super famous. // SwaySway and Buhdeuce accidentally save Oonski from a monster and he owes them a debt of gratitude.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Off to See the Wizard - Brendar and Evan travel to Horus' castle, where the wizard hires her to defeat the evil witch who turned his daughter into an owl. Brendar chooses Axe as her payment, while Evan has to prove he's worthy of going with the group on the quest.

programme.title: Ollie's Pack S01 Ep115
programme.desc: History of Portshill / Trio's a Crowd - Ollie summons Lucius Van Horn to act as the Sasquatch, to amp up Portshill's history. // When Ollie and Bernie get wrapped up in a video game, Cleo befriends a monster, named Trina.

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Mind Meld / Nothing But Truffle - Donnie gets more than he bargained for after he "enhances" his brothers' intelligence. // After a bizarre transformation, Mikey and Meat Sweats become BFFs.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Cup O' Universe / You're In Trouble - The kids discover a universe in a milkshake cup. // While at Tufflips overnight camp, the dudes do their best not to wet the bed.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Dorg Can't Act / Dorg and the Black Hole - When Dorg has stage fright, Yooki secretly uses her powers to help him get the part. // When RD produces a black hole for Dorg's science fair and it gets too big to control, the gang must find a way to close the hole and save the town!

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Trading Day / The Hard Sell - In a moment of weakness, Fanboy agrees to trade Chum Chum for one of Yo's awesome toys. // Oz's mom insists he sell one of his beloved collectibles by day's end, or she will get rid of them all and turn his store into a yogurt shop.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Toast of T.U.F.F. / Share A Lair - Keswick invents an artificial intelligence toaster capable of doing much more than making perfect toast. // T.U.F.F. and D.O.O.M. are forced to share their HQs after destroying each others headquarters.

programme.title: Winx Club S05 Ep513
programme.desc: Sirenix - Tritannus uses Oritel and Marion as bait to learn more about Sirenix from Daphne. With their three gems and the power of Sirenix at their fingertips, the Winx prepare to enter an incredible and new frontier as fairies.

programme.title: Winx Club S05 Ep514
programme.desc: The Emperor's Throne - The Winx start a movement to clean the trash from Gardenia's beach. With their new Sirenix powers, Tritannus and the Trix head to the Emperor's Throne, but Tritannus finds that when he sits on it nothing happens.

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Palace of the Powerless / My Fair Yeti - Felicity and Miguel attend a costume party at The Palace of the Perfect where they end up in a fight to take back some stolen powers. // Yana's invited to a fancy society event, but she's afraid she'll make a fool of herself.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep236
programme.desc: Call the Cops! / Surf N' Turf - Plankton goes to jail, but the secret formula is taken as evidence! SpongeBob and Mr. Krabs plot to get it back. // Sandy struggles to build a ship-in-a-bottle before a big contest, so SpongeBob calls in a little extra help.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep238
programme.desc: Appointment TV / Karen's Virus - The long-lost episode of Mermaid Man is finally showing on TV, but will SpongeBob make it home in time to watch? // Karen gets a computer virus, and it's up to SpongeBob to get it out of her!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep239
programme.desc: The Grill is Gone / The Night Patty - When a gang of kids steals the Krusty Krab's grill, SpongeBob and Mr. Krabs go to extreme lengths to win it back. // SpongeBob helps out the Krusty Krab's night shift crew, but the customers crave something creepier than usual.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep240

programme.title: Four Corners Ep28
programme.desc: How consultants infiltrated government. Firms push ethical boundaries and cost billions of dollars with little transparency and almost no accountability. We reveal accusations of wasted public money and conflicts of interest.

programme.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat Of Japan
programme.desc: Sawara Taisai looks back 300 years to a time when the town of Sawara was a vibrant cultural center. Large, elaborately decorated floats are paraded through the streets.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Maggie Aderin-Pocock is a popular space scientist and communicator working in the UK. She is also an author of several children's books, and worked on the James Webb Space Telescope.

programme.title: Ukiyoe Edo-Life: A Stylish Concert
programme.desc: We attend a New Year's concert at a samurai residence, where a master koto player delights a crowd of gorgeously dressed celebrity-types. Lounging in the best seat in the house is no ordinary V.I.P.

programme.title: 100 Cameras
programme.desc: The Nebuta Festival is the most exciting event of the year for the people of Aomori. Our 100 cameras capture behind-the-scenes footage of the local community eagerly preparing for the festival.

programme.title: Sharing The Future
programme.desc: In Kenya's capital Nairobi, many taxi drivers struggle to pay rental fees on their vehicles. One Japanese startup is providing financial services to help locals work towards owning their own cars.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Artists Against War
programme.desc: Morimura Yasumasa is a renowned artist known for his maverick self-portraits. When asked whether he could become Putin, he starts recounting his thoughts on the role of art in relation to war.

programme.title: On The Wings 5Min.
programme.desc: Join us on a night flight to admire Japan's stunning views on a journey from Tokyo to Fukuoka. Behold the sublime beauty of Mt. Fuji at sunset and the sparkling night views of major cities.

programme.title: Trails To Oishii Tokyo
programme.desc: Somen: these traditional Japanese noodles are amazingly thin and white. We visit Miwa, Nara to see how classic techniques stretch somen again and again over two days. Plus, great somen dishes!

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Biz Stream Special Edition
programme.desc: This episode features a unique new Japanese tableware rental service. The concept is helping restaurants facing tight budgets while also providing a much-needed boost to a struggling industry.

programme.title: A Culture Built With Wood Kiso
programme.desc: The Kiso region in Nagano Prefecture is covered by coniferous forests that have been tended by human hands over generations. Join us as we savor the rich culture they've shaped.

programme.title: Dive In Tokyo
programme.desc: The Takanawa area made headlines in 2020 with the opening of a new station along the Yamanote loop line. We learn about its history as a gateway to the city and discover a grand vision for its future.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: My Street Piano
programme.desc: Surrounded by cute figurines, a piano stands inside a station located in central Hokkaido Prefecture. Watch players from all walks of life come to share their melodies on the piano.

programme.title: Ninja Truth Episode 3
programme.desc: The ninja employed over 400 special weapons and tools to accomplish their missions. We'll examine the shuriken, one of the most popular ninja weapons, using modern techniques.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to wind. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: Elegant and practical, braided cords are essential for kimono and other aspects of everyday life.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Framing Everyday Moments
programme.desc: A unique time-lapse photography project. Shot by pros and non-pros from around the world, on the transience of nature, celestial phenomena, cityscapes and each single moment of everyday life.

programme.title: Ukiyoe Edo-Life: A Stylish Concert
programme.desc: We attend a New Year's concert at a samurai residence, where a master koto player delights a crowd of gorgeously dressed celebrity-types. Lounging in the best seat in the house is no ordinary V.I.P.

programme.title: Kaizoku: The Kurushima Straits
programme.desc: The Murakami Kaizoku were seafarers and fighters in the Seto Inland Sea. We explore their history and legacy, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time, the Kurushima Straits.

programme.title: Japan From Above: Up Close
programme.desc: This program takes you on an aerial journey across 21st century Japan. Enjoy the bird's-eye view of unique landscapes as well as intimate portraits of the people who inhabit the archipelago.

programme.title: Kabuki Kool
programme.desc: This time, a fantastic dance play "The Snowbound Barrier" from the 18th c. with an ambitious villain defeated by the spirit of the cherry tree in the form of a beautiful woman.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Biz Stream Special Edition
programme.desc: This episode features a unique new Japanese tableware rental service. The concept is helping restaurants facing tight budgets while also providing a much-needed boost to a struggling industry.

programme.title: National Parks Of Japan:Towada
programme.desc: Towada-Hachimantai National Park comprises the nature-rich Oirase-Keiryu, the crystal-clear Lake Towada, and the lush marshlands of Mt. Hachimantai. It presents nature in its many forms.

programme.title: Core Kyoto
programme.desc: The ancient capital, Kyoto, continues to be innovative after 1,200 years. We dive deep into its core. Today: Gozan-no-okuribi that ceremonial bonfires give ancestors safe passage.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: A Culture Built With Wood Hida
programme.desc: The Hida region in Gifu Prefecture has some of Japan's most extensive broadleaf forests and has been home to artisans who possess sophisticated woodworking skills, such as kigumi or wood joinery.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Besides helping to revive the Tour de France Femmes for the first time in 13 years, Kathryn Bertine, former pro cyclist and CEO of an NPO, strives to eliminate gender disparities in the cycling world.

programme.title: Design X Stories
programme.desc: Today's theme: Active Communities. Isolation is a key concern worldwide but community hubs support mental and physical health. Explore networks, spaces, and dive into the world of community design.

programme.title: Japanology Plus
programme.desc: Goldfish: Much loved as pets, and as a design motif. Each time, Peter Barakan visits key locations, and meets experts with fascinating cultural insights.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Sandhagen vs Font
programme.desc: Prelims - A bantamweight bout between former interim UFC Bantamweight Championship challenger Cory Sandhagen and Umar Nurmagomedov was expected to headline the event. However, Nurmagomedov withdrew from the event in mid-July due to a shoulder injury. He was replaced by Rob Font in a catchweight bout of 140 pounds. The Ultimate Fighter: Team Joanna vs. Team Cludia women's strawweight winner Tatiana Suarez and Virna Jandiroba were scheduled to meet in a women's strawweight bout. However on June 20, it was announced that Jandiroba pulled out due to a knee injury and was replaced by former UFC Women's Strawweight Champion Jssica Andrade.

programme.title: 2023Gran Premio MotoGP Guru by Gryfyn de Espaa Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The Spanish Grand Prix at the Circuito de Jerez is a colourful event which draws massive crowds from all over to watch the worlds best riders do battle in the sunshine of Andalusia. The Jerez circuit in southern Spain was built in 1986, hosted its first Grand Prix a year later and has remained on the MotoGP calendar ever since. As a nation, Spain has produced some great riders over the years such as Angel Nieto, Ricardo Tormo, Sito Pons, Alex Criville and Jorge Martinez Aspar. The likes of Jorge Lorenzo, Marc Marquez, Dani Pedrosa and Maverick Viales now continue the Spanish success story in the premier class
